name: Linking Forks
description:
Sounds missing, particles missing, no animations, projectiles face the wrong way, no menu or nice interface. Need to iterate more on mechanics.

(The original is made in 2 days. Unfortunately the first day we didn't have time to work on it. I used 1 rating day to add some gameplay features that were planned, read below)

Goal:

Link enemies among them, match the combos on the post-it, then plug them in the outlets to fry them. Combos also give weapons and powerups.  Survive.

Controls:

-LMB to shoot

-RMB to link enemies among them / plug 3 linked enemies in outlet /grapple on outlets

-WASD to move

-TAB to open/close the instructions

Authors:

Iacopo Regoli | Game design, game programming

Hilary Palazzolo | Graphic design | Instagram

External Credits:

Music from https://mixkit.co/

Special thanks to our friends that supported us and playtested.

Patch v1.0.1:

-Game is now paused on start

-Instructions are reworked for clarity

Patch v1.1.0:

-Some gameplay changes: there is now only one post-it, there is a combo meter that increases with each combo done, and with time depletes. First combo swaps your weapon to a special one, then every new combo upgrades the weapon stats until the meter depletes. Keep the meter up by doing combos.

I used 1 more day for development, during the rating, since I lost the first day of jam because of work. I think its fair, but if you want to play and vote on the original jam version then you can download the JAM Version  :D
